    • Method Detail

      • cardList

        public static java.lang.String[][] cardList()
        This program creates the cards we plan to use in a 2D array.
        Returns:
        It returns the whole 2D array with all the spots filled out by cards.

      • firstPart

        public static java.lang.String firstPart(java.lang.String[][] cards,
                                         int k)
        This program generates the number/face value of the cards in the deck
        Parameters:
        cards - unassigned array that makes up the deck of cards
        k - represents the row of the deck and is used to assign values
        Returns:
        first part of the cards in the deck

      • secondPart

        public static java.lang.String secondPart(java.lang.String[][] cards,
                                          int i)
        This program generates whether the cards are clove, spade, heart, or jack
        Parameters:
        cards - unassigned array that makes up the deck of cards
        i - represents column of the double array and is used to assign value.
        Returns:
        second part of the cards in the deck

      • thirdPart

        public static java.lang.String thirdPart(java.lang.String[][] cards,
                                         int i)
        This program generates whether the cards are red or black
        Parameters:
        cards - unassigned array that makes up the deck of cards
        i - represents column of the double array and is used to assign value.
        Returns:
        third part of the cards in the deck

      • generateCard2

        public static java.lang.String generateCard2(java.lang.String[][] cards,
                                             java.lang.String card1,
                                             java.lang.String card2)
        This method generates a random card for the user.
        Parameters:
        cards - This is the whole deck of cards
        card1 - This represents the user's first cards
        card2 - This represents the user's second card
        Returns:
        Returns a randomly chosen card from the array cards

      • generateCard1

        public static java.lang.String generateCard1(java.lang.String[][] cards)
        This method generates a random card for the user.
        Parameters:
        cards - This is the whole deck of Cards
        Returns:
        Returns a randomly chosen card from the array Cards

      • generateCard3

        public static java.lang.String generateCard3(java.lang.String[][] cards,
                                             java.lang.String result1)
        This method generates the second card in the user's/computer's hand.
        Parameters:
        cards - This is the array that represents the deck of cards
        result1 - This is the first card the user got. It is used here to make sure there are no repeated cards.
        Returns:
        returns the second card in the user's/computer's hand.
